Usage Guidelines

The signature colors of IMS Health are made up of cooler hues that drive our brand recognition. With a mix of trust, loyalty, and playful sophistication, these colors make our branding immediately recognizable. Itâ€™s best to use one to two primary colors as your dominant color within an app/design, refrain from using all 3 at once. Primary colors help determine your dominant app color ie. text links, buttons, navigation and overall look and feel. Use variations of that color to show interactivity, i.e. all buttons are Water 300, and hover interaction uses Water 400.
